page.title: 03DORSINGTON MANOR GARDENS
page.content:
3 male pigs, 3 Donkeys, 1 Shetland pony, 31 Jacob sheep, 27 Black Welsh mountain sheep, 950 breeding birds, 1200 Young birds A lot of famous people have come to the Manor:- Pam Ayres Duchess of Devonshire Pebble Mill reporter Professor Sir Allen Parkes
Other details about the Manor
high water table a few wells 11 walnut trees(8 mature),walnut trees are not common around Dorsington All three woodpecker species visit the manor frequently They own the longest thatched barn in Warwickshire.
